TITLE
iTunes 2: How to Change the Order of Columns

front.note:
TOPIC
You can rearrange the information columns in playlists and the library.
DISCUSSION
You can rearrange the information columns in playlists and the library.
Drag the column heading to a new position.
You can also choose which columns you want to display using the View Options
command in the Edit menu.
